GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.16.12
GSD.description:
net/mlx5: DR, Fix slab-out-of-bounds in mlx5_cmd_dr_create_fte

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.12 by commit 4ad319cdfbe555b4ff67bc608736c46a6930c848, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 1ffd498901c1134a7cbecf5409e12c064c39cef9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/mlx5: DR, Fix slab-out-of-bounds in mlx5_cmd_dr_create_fte
